body_html: Not sure there is any fix in the works. But I believe there may be a workaround, where you can create a separate GraphKey for variables that are downstream of Queues, and run initialization of those variables after queue initialization. Have to test it but believe it should work.

body: Not sure there is any fix in the works. But I believe there may be a workaround, where you can create a separate GraphKey for variables that are downstream of Queues, and run initialization of those variables after queue initialization. Have to test it but believe it should work.
